items.name: init(provider: String?, busName: String?, busNumber: String?, tripDuration: INDateComponentsRange, departureBusStopLocation: CLPlacemark, departurePlatform: String?, arrivalBusStopLocation: CLPlacemark, arrivalPlatform: String?)
items.desc: Creates a bus trip with the specified contents and attributes.

items.name: var arrivalBusStopLocation: CLPlacemark
items.desc: The bus stop where the trip ends.

items.name: var arrivalPlatform: String?
items.desc: The platform at which the bus arrives.

items.name: var busNumber: String?
items.desc: The number of the bus or route.

items.name: var departureBusStopLocation: CLPlacemark
items.desc: The bus stop where the bus trip starts.

items.name: var departurePlatform: String?
items.desc: The platform from which the bus departs.

items.name: var provider: String?
items.desc: The business or other entity operating the bus.

items.name: var tripDuration: INDateComponentsRange
items.desc: The timespan of the bus trip from departure to arrival.
